law.catch_line: In the absence of actual knowledge or of reasonable cause to inquire as to whether a trustee is impr...
law.text: In the absence of actual knowledge or of reasonable cause to inquire as to whether a trustee is improperly exercising his power, a person dealing with a trustee need not inquire whether a trustee is properly exercising his power, and is protected as if the trustee properly exercised the power. A person need not see to the proper application of trust assets paid or delivered to a trustee.
